subject: Re: [junit] How to pass commandline parameter throw Junit
msgSnippet: ... The JUnit test runners are just Java processes. JVM properties (-D switch) would work. -- J. B. Rainsberger, Diaspar Software Services
messageBody:
kavi_sydney wrote:

> How to pass commandline parameter throw Junit.I need to pass two
> integer value in the command line.

The JUnit test runners are just Java processes. JVM properties (-D
switch) would work.
--
J. B. Rainsberger,
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com :: +1 416 791-8603
Let's write software that people understand
